name: Master Flow - Arrows and much more
description:
A full library to easily document your userflows, screens, and product features.


Just drop a flow component and switch the path, kind of interaction, and the what happens next.


Paths and Flows:

  • Straight
  • Corners
  • 3 steps Snake
  • Hook
  • U-Turn
  • Split


Also Included:

  • Interactions
  • Process blocks such as decision, terminators, delay, etc.
  • Cover template with status
  • Group/Swimlane
  • Internal page content/actions
  • Comment
  • Helpful product feature documentation


If this has touched your heart, feel free to donate.


--

Changelog:

→ April 20, 2022

  • Removed dashed lines in order to simplify the whole file.
  • Add new variations of Snake path (Steps determine the length until the first curve).

→ June 04, 2021

  • Added "Group/Swimlane" component
  • Added "Internal Content" component

→ June 02, 2021

  • Now the arrows doesn't overlap the blocks (stick on their boundaries).

→ May 10, 2021

  • Added "Comment" component
  • Standardized the fonts
